definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: There are many cases of human rights violations filed before the police.
sentences.chinese: 警方接手许多人权侵犯案件，往往牵连到高级官员。

sentences.english: No others were injured in the incident, police said.
sentences.chinese: 在这个枪击事件中没有人受伤，警方说。

sentences.english: They rely on police and media pressure to reform such businesses, he added.
sentences.chinese: 他们依靠警方和媒体压力来改革此类营生，他说。

sentences.english: The police report described, in horrifying detail, the nightmare that followed.
sentences.chinese: 警方卷宗描述了接下来发生的噩梦，令人战栗的细节。

sentences.english: As the police moved in, the hostages were running out, he said.
sentences.chinese: 随着警方进入该区域，人质也都四散跑出。

sentences.english: Perak, Malaysia is currently the police are stepping into the cause.
sentences.chinese: 目前马来西亚霹雳州警方正在加紧调查事故的原因。

sentences.english: Mr. Nami, now detained by police, couldn't be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 波和二现在被警方拘留，无法获得他对本案的评论。

sentences.english: Police say Chin appeared fine when guards brought breakfast to his cell.
sentences.chinese: 警方称陈在狱卒给他送早餐的时候看上去一切正常。

sentences.english: She complained to the police about the barking of her neighbour's dog.
sentences.chinese: 她向警方抱怨邻居家的狗叫声。

sentences.english: This gave the impression that the police were content simply to look on.
sentences.chinese: 这给了大众一种印象，警方仅仅满足于作壁上观。

sentences.english: Yellow to porch suffer Hong Kong police, who had to go to taking home for help.
sentences.chinese: 黄以轩遭受香港警方通缉，只好前去去晏家求助。

sentences.english: Game, set, match, Crowley and the Cambridge cops.
sentences.chinese: 克罗利和剑桥市警方获得全胜。

sentences.english: Protesters also clashed with security in the troubled city of Port Said.
sentences.chinese: 抗议人士还在塞得港和警方发生冲突。

sentences.english: See the two men to escape, Li master by telephone to the police report to the police.
sentences.chinese: 见两名男子逃跑后，李师傅借电话向警方报警。

sentences.english: An initial police estimate put the number of participants at 8,000.
sentences.chinese: 警方初步估计参与游行的人数达到了8000。

sentences.english: The police said he self-painted it before he committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 警方估计是他自杀前自己涂上的。

definition: to report a case to the authorities
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
to detain as criminal/criminal detention/abbr. for 刑事拘留[xing2 shi4 ju1 liu2]
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to cause an accident/to be responsible for an incident/to provoke a disturbance
